TopicTitle: Unable to go to KSC or switch to distant vessels

Articles.Content:
After I was working on my Minmus base for a while, I suddenly found myself not able to switch back to KSC or to distant vessels and I had to force close the game. I had been doing a whole bunch of removing and placing RoverDudes version of the KAS pipe (just enlarged and reskinned really), so that may have had something to do with it.

Windows 8.1 64x

KSP 0.90 32x

Modlist: Mostly self explainatory. In USI, I have FTT, Exploration pack, Karbonite, and MKS/OKS. MJallcommand is just a config that enables MJ on all command modules.

Output log: http://sta.sh/0y8qxr7jvyu Near the end, before I force closed it, KSP seemed to be throwing a whole bunch of FAR exceptions and a bunch of others for some reason.

And it's happened again, nobody has a clue what's going on with it?

I tried to get around it with a quicksave and reload, but it breaks even that apparently.

Edited March 9, 2015 by smjjames
*bump* Anybody have a clue? Do I need to give more info or...?

After I was working on my Minmus base for a while, I suddenly found myself not able to switch back to KSC or to distant vessels and I had to force close the game. I had been doing a whole bunch of removing and placing RoverDudes version of the KAS pipe (just enlarged and reskinned really), so that may have had something to do with it.

I've seen something similar with a very different set of extensions.

BTW I think the Unity "Player.log" file is more useful. When I try to leave the current vessel, I get tracebacks like:

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object  at PatchedConicRenderer.OnSceneSwitch (GameScenes scn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at EventData`1[GameScenes].Fire (GameScenes data) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at HighLogic.LoadScene (GameScenes scene) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at PauseMenu.saveAndExit (GameScenes sceneToLoad, .Game stateToSave) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at PauseMenu.draw (Int32 id) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at UnityEngine.GUILayout+LayoutedWindow.DoWindow (Int32 windowID) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at UnityEngine.GUI.CallWindowDelegate (UnityEngine.WindowFunction func, Int32 id, UnityEngine.GUISkin _skin, Int32 forceRect, Single width, Single h\
eight, UnityEngine.GUIStyle style) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
 (Filename:  Line: -1)

I originally thought it was KJR, but then reproduced it without KJR:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-90-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-1-1-15-15?p=1764164#post1764164
